import React, {useState} from 'react' import Nav from '../components/Nav' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import './CurrencyConverter.css' const url = 'https://blockchain.info/ticker' const CurrencyConverter = () => { const [currency, setCurrency] = useState([]) async function fetchTours() { const data = await fetch(url) const jsonData = await data.json() setCurrency(jsonData) } return (
console.log()

Convert any Value in any Currency to BTC

) } export default CurrencyConverter
